settings.title: NEXT MOTA CAR GIVEAWAY
settings.text:
1967 FORD MUSTANG FASTBACK GT500 'ELEANOR'

This car was made infamous from the 'Gone in Sixty Seconds' movie franchise.

One of our members is going to win this incredible car!
This special car is on the Eleanor international register. It comes with certififcate and offical registry documentation.

Indivual entries for this giveaway will not go live until the conclusion of our 1978 Porsche Turbo giveaway. To start accumualting entires into this giveaway draw and for your best chance to win, grab a VIP membership now and you will automatically be entered in to win this Mustang and all future giveaways. VIP membership gives you compounding ticket entries each month, so the longer you stay a member, the more entires you receive into each of our giveaways.

We will be very sad to see this car leave our headquarters, but very happy to see the winner collect it and enjoy it! This car is rare, highly collectible, appreciating in value and in immaculate condition! Follow us on socials for future giveaway updates and new video releases.

Permit Number:Â TP/01963
